briefdescription.para: When freeze property is set to true, the map canvas does not refresh.

detaileddescription.para: The value temporary changes during the rendering process.

briefdescription.para: When the incrementalRendering property is set to true, the automatic refresh of map canvas during rendering is allowed.
The isRendering property is set to true while a rendering job is pending for this map canvas map.

detaileddescription.para: It can be used to show a notification icon about an ongoing rendering job. This is a readonly property.

briefdescription.para: The mapSettings property contains configuration for rendering of the map.

detaileddescription.para: It should be used as a primary source of map settings (and project) for all other components in the application.

briefdescription.para: Interval in milliseconds after which the map canvas will be updated while a rendering job is ongoing.

detaileddescription.para: This only has an effect if incrementalRendering is activated. Default is 250 [ms].

briefdescription.para: Create map canvas map.
When freeze property is set to true, the map canvas does not refresh.

detaileddescription.para: The value temporary changes during the rendering process.

briefdescription.para: When the incrementalRendering property is set to true, the automatic refresh of map canvas during rendering is allowed.
The isRendering property is set to true while a rendering job is pending for this map canvas map.

detaileddescription.para: It can be used to show a notification icon about an ongoing rendering job. This is a readonly property.

briefdescription.para: The mapSettings property contains configuration for rendering of the map.

detaileddescription.para: It should be used as a primary source of map settings (and project) for all other components in the application.

briefdescription.para: Interval in milliseconds after which the map canvas will be updated while a rendering job is ongoing.

detaileddescription.para: This only has an effect if incrementalRendering is activated. Default is 250 [ms].

detaileddescription.para: The value temporary changes during the rendering process.

briefdescription.para: When the incrementalRendering property is set to true, the automatic refresh of map canvas during rendering is allowed.
Interval in milliseconds after which the map canvas will be updated while a rendering job is ongoing.

detaileddescription.para: This only has an effect if incrementalRendering is activated. Default is 250 [ms].

briefdescription.para: When freeze property is set to true, the map canvas does not refresh.

detaileddescription.para: The value temporary changes during the rendering process.

briefdescription.para: When the incrementalRendering property is set to true, the automatic refresh of map canvas during rendering is allowed.
The isRendering property is set to true while a rendering job is pending for this map canvas map.

detaileddescription.para: It can be used to show a notification icon about an ongoing rendering job. This is a readonly property.

briefdescription.para: Signal is emitted when a canvas is refreshed.
Interval in milliseconds after which the map canvas will be updated while a rendering job is ongoing.

detaileddescription.para: This only has an effect if incrementalRendering is activated. Default is 250 [ms].

briefdescription.para: Signal is emitted when a rendering is starting.
Set map setting's extent (pan the map) based on the difference of positions.
Refresh the map canvas.

detaileddescription.para: Does nothing when output size of map settings is not set

briefdescription.para: Stop map rendering.
Set map setting's extent (zoom the map) on the center by given scale.
Should only be called by stopRendering()!
This class implements a visual Qt Quick Item that does map rendering according to the current map settings.

detaileddescription.para: Client code is expected to use MapCanvas item rather than using this class directly.

QgsQuickMapCanvasMap instance internally creates QgsQuickMapSettings in constructor. The QgsProject should be attached to the QgsQuickMapSettings. The map settings for other QgsQuick components should be initialized from QgsQuickMapCanvasMap's mapSettings
